Timestamp a PGP signature in Bitcoin (@opentimestamps) to prove the signature existed *before* a certain time.  Include latest bitcoin block hash in data you sign : prove it was created  *after* a certain time.  Do both: irrefutably prove the time interval of a PGP signature!💡
